title: The epitaphe of the honorable Earle of Penbroke, Baron of Cardiffe, and knight of the most noble order of the garter Who dyed Lord stueward of the Qu√©enes maiesties houshold, and of her priuie counsell.
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: In Fletestreat at the signe of the Faucon by Wylliam Gryffith: and are to be sold at his shoppe in S. Dunstones Churchyard,
notes: Signed: Quoth Churchyard, i.e. Thomas Churchyard.
Verse - "Since playnts want power to perce the skyes, or rayes the dead from graue,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
